page.title: 15SOCIAL CONCERNS - HOUSING
page.content: SOME OF THE RESIDENTS WERE WORRIED BY THE HARM TO THE CHARM OF THE AREA BY THE POLICY OF INFILLING WHICH IS BECOMING INCREASINGLY PREVALENT, AND WHICH IS A VERY REAL SOCIAL CONCERN. MANY OF THE LARGE HOUSES IN OUR AREA HAVE VERY LARGE GARDENS AND WITH THE INCREASING DEMAND FOR BUILDING LAND THEIR OWNERS ARE BEING TEMPTED TO APPLY FOR PLANNING PERMISSION AND TO SELL OFF CHUNKS OF THEIR GARDENS FOR DEVELOPMENT.THIS IS RESULTING IN A MUCH HIGHER DENSITY OF POPULATION IN THE AREA.THE LOCAL RESIDENTS ASSOCIATION IS CURRENTLY VERY ACTIVE IN OPPOSING SUCH DEVELOPMENT OF THE AREA.
